about_the_game:
Craft, and construct strategically placed defenses to protect the home while trying to survive the hostile environment.
The world is packed with wild beasts and stronger foes that only appear at night.
Explore the different unique biomes, enter dungeons, gather epic riches, engage in boss encounters, and more.

  • Gather vital resources, food & minerals.



  • Build shelter, and craft items then upgrade your weapons, armor, and
    other equipment.



  • Battle your way through the lands and fight to survive.
    Some enemies drop rare resource materials that you will need to
    upgrade new towers, weapons, & armor.





  • Keep your defenses up and protect your territory.



  • Survive the more dangerous spawns of darkness.



  • If you're not yet strong enough to fight, there is always the option of running,
    but keep your stamina in check.
